description: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle’s release date on the PS5 will reportedly be announced on Monday. The action-adventure title from Bethesda launched on PC and Xbox Series S/X in December 2024, with a PS5 launch slated for 2025.
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle's PS5 Release Date Will Reportedly Be Announced on March 24

description: Headphone Zone X Oriveti Blackbird in-ear monitors were launched in India on Monday. The audiophile IEMs come with a hybrid driver configuration, including a 10mm dynamic driver for "powerful bass reproduction" and two custom balanced armature drivers for "precise mids and treble delivery." The Blackbird IEMs are offered in an acrylic shell build and come with two types of ear tip options in six pairs for an optimum fit.
title: Headphone Zone X Oriveti Blackbird In-Ear Monitor Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Nvidia released a new artificial intelligence (AI) model last week that can be used to train robots on simulation. Dubbed Cosmos-Transfer 1, the new large language model (LLM) is aimed at AI-powered robotics hardware, also known as physical AI. The company has released the model in open source with a permissive licence, and interested individuals can download it from popular online repositories.
title: Nvidia Releases Cosmos-Transfer1 AI Model That Can Be Used for Simulation-Based Training for Robots

description: Poco F7 Pro and F7 Ultra are set to launch in Singapore on March 27. While the Xiaomi sub-brand has been silent about when it'll launch the vanilla Poco F7, a prominent tipster has suggested its possible launch timeline in India. The Poco F7 is tipped to run on a Snapdragon chipset like its siblings. It is expected to come with upgrades over last year's Poco F6 5G. The brand is speculated to skip the release of Poco F7 Pro and Poco F7 Ultra in the Indian market.
title: Poco F7 India Launch Timeline Leaked; Tipped to Feature Snapdragon 8s Elite Chipset

description: Tamil Nadu’s Director General of Police, Shankar Jiwal, has unveiled a guide for police officials on how to investigate crypto-related crimes. The handbook contains industry insights on crypto crimes like money laundering, ponzi schemes, and cyber fraud. It also covers key legal provisions around crypto and Web3.
title: Tamil Nadu DGP Unveils ‘Handbook for Investigations into Virtual Digital Assets’: All Details

description: Adobe previewed several new enterprise-focused artificial intelligence (AI) tools last week at its Adobe Summit 2025 conference in Las Vegas. The showcases were part of the company’s “Adobe Sneaks” programme, where it shares potential tools that can become part of its enterprise-focused Adobe Experience Platform. This year, the San Jose-based tech giant unveiled several data analysis-focused solutions that use AI agents.
title: Adobe Previews Multiple New AI Agents-Driven Enterprise Tools for Complex Data Analysis

description: Android 16 Developer Preview 3 (DP3) for Pixel smartphones was released last week. It adds a new feature which makes unlocking the phone with the inbuilt fingerprint sensor more convenient, according to a report. The feature is said to allow Pixel users to use the fingerprint unlock sensor even when the screen is turned off.
title: Android 16 Developer Preview 3 Reportedly Enables Screen-Off Fingerprint Unlock on All Pixel Phones

description: Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G India launch is set to take place soon. Realme has started teasing the new Narzo series smartphone through social media handles, but hasn't revealed the exact date. The phone is confirmed to be available for purchase through Amazon India. It will be equipped with a new MediaTek Dimensity chipset. It is tipped to debut with up to 12GB RAM with a maximum of 256GB of storage.
title: Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G Teased to Launch in India Soon; Will Be Equipped With MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC

description: Vivo T4 5G may launch in India soon as a successor to the Vivo T3 5G, which was unveiled in the country in March 2024. Several key features of the purported handset, including its possible price range and expected launch timeline have surfaced online. It may be priced under Rs. 25,000 in India. The handset will likely come with a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 SoC and a 7,300mAh battery with 90W wired fast charging support.
title: Vivo T4 5G Could Launch in India in April; Price Range, Key Features Surface Online

description: Assassin’s Creed Shadows has reached over two million players, Ubisoft confirmed over the weekend. The Japan-set action-RPG hit one million players one its launch day and has quickly doubled its player count in just two days of release.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Hits 2 Millions Players, Surpasses Launches of Assassin's Creed Origins, Odyssey

description: Google Vids, the company's artificial intelligence (AI) video creation tool, is getting a new feature. Announced last week, the Mountain View-based tech giant is now adding AI-powered voiceovers to its ‘Help me create’ feature. With this, the tool will automatically add voiceovers for each scene generated by it. Users will have granular control over the voiceovers.
title: Google Vids Video Creation App Gets Updated With an AI Voiceovers Feature

description: Infinix has revealed several key details about the upcoming Note 50X 5G. It will run on Android 15-based XOS 15 and will be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultimate chipset. Ahead of the March 27 India launch of the smartphone, the company has confirmed that it will come with an IP64-rated dust and splash-resistant build.
title: Infinix Note 50X 5G Confirmed to Offer IP64 Rating Ahead of March 27 India Launch

description: iQOO Z10 is all set to go official in April in India. As we wait for the formal release, iQOO has posted a new teaser on social media revealing the thickness and colour option of the device. Additionally, the company teased the handset on Amazon. The iQOO Z10 will come with upgrades over last year's iQOO Z9 5G.
title: iQOO Z10 Teased to Measure 7.89mm in Thickness; to Be Available on Amazon

description: Tether is seeking a Big Four accounting firm to audit its asset reserves. CEO Paolo Ardoino stated that Tether's stability comes from full backing by dollar-denominated reserves and that President Trump’s pro-crypto stance has motivated the company to pursue this long-overdue audit.
title: Tether to Audit Its Reserves with a Big Four Firm as Trump Puts Crypto in the Spotlight

description: Huawei Watch Fit 3 was launched in select global markets last year. The wearable is now expected to land in the Indian market as a successor to the Huawei Watch Fit 2. Huawei is yet to confirm the launch date of Watch Fit 3, but a new report reveals its launch timeline and price range. It is said to cost around twice as much as the Huawei Watch Fit 2.
title: Huawei Watch Fit 3 Said to Launch in India Next Week, Price Range Tipped

description: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion will launch in India on April 2, the Lenovo-owned company confirmed. It also revealed the design and several key features of the upcoming handset. The handset will be available in light blue, salmon (light pink), and lavender (light purple) colourways. It is confirmed to ship with Android 15-based Hello UI. The Edge 50 Fusion will be equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion India Launch Set for April 2; Design, Key Features Revealed

description: NDTV Gadgets 360 Awards is back with its 2025 iteration! The biggest tech event will honour tech excellence in 40 different categories, including smartphones, laptops, SoC, tablets, Smart TVs, TWS, wearable, and more. India’s largest tech award show will take place on March 25, 2025, in New Delhi.
title: NDTV Gadgets 360 Awards 2025: Check out the Nominations for India’s Most Trusted Award Show

description: In a rather controversial move, Nothing ended up using UFS 2.2 storage for its recently launched Phone 3a and Phone 3a Pro. While many criticised the move, Nothing stood by it. Now, the company has finally provided a reasonable explanation as to why it chose to use dated storage.
title: Nothing Explains Why It Used UFS 2.2 Storage in Phone 3a and Phone 3a Pro

description: OpenAI and Meta are reportedly discussing an artificial intelligence (AI) partnership with Indian conglomerate Reliance Industries. As per the report, the San Francisco-based AI firm and the Menlo Park-based social media giant are aiming to expand their AI footprint in the country by using the Mukesh Ambani-led company’s large consumer and enterprise-focused base.
title: OpenAI and Meta Eye AI to Reportedly Form Partnership With Reliance Industries

description: Oppo Find X8 Ultra is all set to launch next month in China. Oppo, via Weibo, has confirmed the arrival of the new Find X8 series smartphone in its home country. The launch event will also see the debut of Oppo Find X8s and Find X8s+ models. The brand will also release Oppo Watch X2 Mini smartwatch, Pad 4 Pro tablet, and Enco Free 4 earbuds at the same event.
title: Oppo Find X8 Ultra, Find X8s Series to Debut on April 10; Colours, RAM and Storage Details Revealed

description: A new report suggests that Samsung’s smart glasses, codenamed “Haean”, could make its debut as soon as this year. It will reportedly be launched alongside Project Moohan — the in-development extended reality (XR) headset — by the end of 2025, marking the company’s foray into the wearable glasses market.
title: Samsung ‘Haean’ Android-Powered Smart Glasses to Reportedly Launch Alongside Project Moohan This Year

description: The US SEC's crypto task force held its first public meeting with experts to discuss if crypto assets should come under securities laws. Republican SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce is leading the task force, which is charged with developing rules and guidance for crypto.
title: US SEC Holds Crypto Task Force Roundtable as Trump Plans Regulatory Revamp

description: WhatsApp is said to be developing a new feature for its iOS app aimed at making sharing music on status updates easier. According to claims by a feature tracker, it was spotted within the latest beta version of WhatsApp for iOS and enables users to share music from Spotify on their status updates.
title: WhatsApp for iOS Reportedly Developing Ability to Share Music on Status Updates via Spotify

description: A new God of War game, possibly a smaller spinoff project, set in the series’ original Greek mythology is said to arrive later this year. The rumour comes when the iconic PlayStation franchise is celebrating its 20th anniversary and offering a new free update for God of War Ragnarök to mark the occasion.
title: A New God of War 'Side-Story Project' Set in Greek Mythology Is Reportedly Coming in 2025

description: Bitcoin and Ether registered small gains alongside Ripple, Solana, and Leo. Losses struck Monero and Chainlink among others. The overall crypto market cap grew by 2.30 percent over the last 24 hours.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin, Ether See Small Profits, Altcoins Show Mixed Trends Amid Market Uncertainty

description: Google is reportedly rolling out its two major Gemini features — live video and screen-sharing. The Mountain View-based tech giant first unveiled these features at Google I/O 2024. Developed by Google DeepMind under Project Astra, these features come with live multimodal data processing capabilities and allows the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot to answer queries about the user’s device and their surroundings in real-time.
title: Google Reportedly Rolling Out Gemini Live Video and Screen-Sharing Features

description: Samsung Galaxy A26 5G is now available for purchase in India. It is powered by an in-house octa-core Exynos 1380 SoC paired with 8GB of RAM. The phone has an IP67 dust and water-resistant build as well. The handset was initially unveiled in select global markets earlier this month alongside the Galaxy A56 5G and Galaxy A36 5G.
title: Samsung Galaxy A26 5G Price in India Revealed; Comes With Exynos 1380 SoC, IP67-Rated Build

description: Apple's foldable iPhone has been in the rumour mill for quite some time now. The Cupertino-based tech giant is expected to be preparing to reveal its first foldable iPhone next year and the latest report by Bloomberg's Mark Gurman adds more credibility to this claims. The design language of the foldable handset is said to be identical to Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold series. The foldable iPhone could borrow tech from the upcoming iPhone 17 Air.
title: Apple's Foldable iPhone to Launch in 2026, to Have the Same Technologies as iPhone 17 Air: Mark Gurman

description: Cooler Master Shark X PC was launched in India on Monday. The Cooler Master Shark X PC is introduced as a luxury machine for gamers and content creators, powered by up to AMD Ryzen 9 9900X processor and up to Asus Prime GeForce RTX 5080 GPU.
title: Cooler Master Shark X PC With AMD Ryzen 9 SoC, GeForce RTX 5080 GPU Launched in India

description: Motorola is expected to unveil the Razr 60 Ultra clamshell foldable in select global markets soon. Several leaked renders of the purported device have previously surfaced online, suggesting its design and colourways. A new leak has hinted that the successor to the Motorola Razr 50 Ultra will likely get a pink colour option. The smartphone was reportedly spotted on China's TENAA website, suggesting several key specifications as well.
title: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra Leaked Render Shows Pink Colour Option; Reportedly Spotted on TENAA Site

description: Apple is planning to integrate cameras into its smartwatches, according to claims by a seasoned journalist. The Cupertino-based technology giant may add a camera near the crown and the button on the Apple Watch Ultra’s side, allowing the user to scan an object around them and get information about it.
title: Apple Watch May Reportedly Integrate Cameras to Become an AI Wearable

description: Google Pixel 10 series is rumoured to be in development as the successor to last year’s Pixel 9 lineup. Ahead of its anticipated debut, a report suggests that the company may leverage a graphics processing unit (GPU) developed by UK-based Imagination Technologies in the Tensor G5 SoC to power its purported smartphones.
title: Google’s Tensor G5 SoC May Use Imagination Technologies’ GPU to Power Pixel 10 Series
